tool_description:
**This documentation gives you real time experience on PayU Biz APIs you can interact with.** 

> On hitting the API with params, it gives you following:


 > i). Status code of API. 
 >
 > ii). Response of the API in response body
 >
 > iii).Response headers
 >
 > iv). Schemas of the API
 >
 > v). CURL request 
 >
 > vi). Error codes with reasons
name: Demo APIs
title: Demo APIs

api_list.name: post-/postservice#cod_settled-5bd0a2da-747a-4361-8bbe-3082a423e0a6
api_list.description: cod_settled API should be executed on a transaction only when cod_verify has already been executed. cod_settled updates the transaction status from ‘pending’ to ‘captured’. It is suggested, that you execute this API only when you are sure that money has been successfully received from the customer at your end.

api_list.name: post-/postservice#capture_transaction-5a4c24d1-ad6d-4181-b7fe-5389c8a2561c
api_list.description: This command is used to update the status of a transaction which is in auth (authorized) state at the moment and this API is applicable only for transactions in pre-auth status.

api_list.name: post-/postservice#delete_user_card-1157d12d-f678-40ed-9e59-87e17539bf7e
api_list.description: In this case, along with all the parameters that are required to save to the card, cardToken of the card to edit is also required to be passed. On successfully editing the card, it returns the cardToken of the card.

api_list.name: post-/postservice#cancel_refund_transaction-fed8bfe5-8195-49d2-b169-a588b4b1e15a
api_list.description:
This command can be used for 2 different purposes
1).To cancel a transaction which is in ‘​auth’​ state at the moment 2).To refund a transaction which is in ‘​captured’​ state at the moment

api_list.name: post-/postservice#get_merchant_ibibo_codes-e11e9523-1495-48e1-9273-529d6d28ebc0
api_list.description: In this API, var1 needs to be left empty in the input and var2 needs to be kept as 1.

api_list.name: post-/postservice#check_payment-c9864677-17b4-47d9-91c9-2ee5a480fb50
api_list.description: This API functions similar to verify_payment API mentioned above. The only difference is that the input parameter in this API is the PayUID (MihpayID) generated at PayU’s end whereas the input parameter in verify_payment API is the TxnID (Transaction ID generated at your end). It returns all the parameters for a given transaction.

api_list.name: post-/postservice#get_transaction_info-7aac7203-8883-472e-971b-1c475d7df069
api_list.description: This API works exactly the same way as ​get_Transaction_Details API. The only enhancement is that this API can take input as the exact time in terms of minutes and seconds also. Output would be in the same format as get_Transaction_Details API output.

api_list.name: post-/postservice#verify_payment-95c7bea2-55db-45c4-a870-8c369ef38f0a
api_list.description: This API gives response after hitting with required parameter fields

api_list.name: post-/postservice#getAllRefundsFromTxnIds-b05d7af3-023f-423d-b13e-a0e3a95cd031
api_list.description: This command is used to retrieve status of all the refund requests fired for a particular Transaction ID.

api_list.name: post-/postservice#get_Transaction_Details-23a0708c-9328-40ae-838f-8e0c9651f62c
api_list.description: The API takes the input as two dates (initial and final), between which the transaction details are needed. The output would consist of the status of the API (success or failed) and all the transaction details in an array format.

api_list.name: post-/postservice#get_user_cards-32408275-f6ad-4959-9899-f075dbbef292
api_list.description: In case the merchant is managing card details on its own website, this API can tell the issuing bank of the card bin. It also provides the minimum eligible amount for a particular bank.

api_list.name: post-/postservice#eligibleBinsForEMI-b4615051-f031-44d8-b346-ef3656a3a281
api_list.description: In case the merchant is managing card details on its own website, this API can tell the issuing bank of the card bin. It also provides the minimum eligible amount for a particular bank.

api_list.name: post-/postservice#edit_user_card-28e9d66b-0e3a-42af-b3c4-ff2d32532286
api_list.description: In this case, along with all the parameters that are required to save to the card, cardToken of the card to edit is also required to be passed. On successfully editing the card, it returns the cardToken of the card.

api_list.name: post-/postservice#getNetbankingStatus-9ef80b25-1aed-4164-95dc-a26d560d1662
api_list.description: This API is used to tell the status of one or all the net banking options. The status can be either up or down.

api_list.name: post-/postservice#cod_cancel-a1055b47-f2bb-41da-90b1-5c0549d85ca4
api_list.description: This API can be executed to change the transaction status from ‘​in progress’ to ‘​cancelled’ ​in the PayU database

api_list.name: post-/postservice#get_TDR-faa53cdf-7295-4597-a74d-4b5dd127a2c1
api_list.description: It is a simple API for which you need to provide the PayU ID of the transaction as input and the TDR value is returned in the output..

api_list.name: post-/postservice#check_offer_status (1st Usage)-497f301b-f3e4-4d8a-ab85-86b1343da52f
api_list.description: The return parameters are status, msg, discount/error_code, category, offer_key, offer_type(instant/ cashback) , offer_availed_count, offer_remaining_count.

api_list.name: post-/postservice#cod_verify-cb33dc65-b331-4ae3-a763-3e7ea73cbdc3
api_list.description: When a transaction is successful through PayU, it is marked as ​‘in progress’ at that moment. The reason is that the money hasn’t been received yet and hence we mark it in this intermediary state. Once you verify the transaction with the customer, you can execute this API to update the status in PayU Database from ‘​in progress’ to ‘​pending’​.

api_list.name: post-/postservice#udf_update-c09e69bc-4526-4092-90f8-2322b31d2d90
api_list.description: UDFs are the user-defined fields which are posted from the merchant to PayU. This API is specifically used to update the values in these fields in PayU Database.

api_list.name: post-/postservice#update_requests-5da9337c-1a73-42b1-9a45-94f46cf53109
api_list.description: This command is used to update the status of a transaction which is in auth (authorized) state at the moment and this API is applicable only for transactions in pre-auth status.

api_list.name: post-/postservice#check_isDomestic-57a02c52-fd3d-4b98-bc13-3ff8faf77e84
api_list.description: It is also useful to determine the card’s issuing bank, the card type brand – i.e, Visa, Master etc and also the Card Category – i.e. Credit/Debit etc. Bin number is the first 6 digits of a Credit/Debit card.

api_list.name: post-/postservice#clemi_pincode_check-377ae148-8dd2-45a5-b612-3d55c18a5a34
api_list.description:
The pincode to be checked is given as input and its eligibility is accordingly returned in the response. The response parameters are eligibility status [status] and an accompanying message [msg].
The status is returned as ‘1’ in case of eligible pincode, ‘-1’ in case of ineligible (but valid) pincode and ‘0’ in case of any errors.

api_list.name: post-/postservice#getIssuingBankDownBins-42ea1c0f-a040-45b7-9653-31670e55ff5d
api_list.description: The information related to full/partial downtime depends on the input parameter values.

api_list.name: post-/postservice#check_action_status(1st Usage)-a88eac30-4b0a-483d-b040-56dea7184606
api_list.description: This API is used to check the status of refund/cancel requests. Whenever the cancel_refund_transaction API is executed successfully, a ​Request ID is returned in the output parameters for that particular request.

api_list.name: post-/postservice#save_user_card-057fad6d-5af9-4e7d-9abe-0c48fe987a95
api_list.description: On successful storing of the card, it returns the cardToken.

api_list.name: post-/postservice#check_action_status_2ndUsage-30fe5009-a0f6-41ee-a2bb-1176d14d217c
api_list.description: This command has a second usage also. For a particular PayUID, it returns the status of all request (capture/refund/cancel).

api_list.name: post-/postservice#get_settlement_details-1055cd21-5752-489a-a8e8-3fa1aa22768e
api_list.description: The input is the date for which Settlement Details are required.

api_list.name: post-/postservice#getIssuingBankStatus-f1cb7173-f145-4e58-8236-297e1c9cee72
api_list.description: It allows you get the present status of an Issuing Bank using the specific Bank Identification Number (BIN). BIN is identified as the first 6 digits of a credit/debit card.

api_list.name: post-/postservice#check_offer_status (2nd Usage)-dafaf21f-4bad-4fc9-8c7a-50603058fecf
api_list.description: This API can be used to check the offer status when offer is created using bin only. In this case we can depict that the offer has been created for which category (like CC/DC/NB/EMI).
